name: The Anachronistic Early 2000's Vaporwave Graphics Card Box Generator
name_original: The Anachronistic Early 2000's Vaporwave Graphics Card Box Generator
description:
Welcome to the Anachronistic Early 2000's Vaporwave Graphics Card Box Generator, a game by me, Tyler Rhodes for
Team Dogpit's VaporJam

Make an Amazing Box to Sell Old Graphics Cards to Vaporwave Enthusiasts

Click the Icons on the Left side of the screen to select an Image group, the click on the Box to place Images on the Box

Click the 'I'm done!' button to see your Finished Graphics Card Box!

Press R to reload the game for more Boxes

Special thanks to
Neil Carter
Sam Loeschen

and

AVINAS
own.guest

for their helpful 3D models!
